segments.text: Hey, have you started a proposal for our group project yet?
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Not yet, but I've been thinking about some topics. I was leaning towards something with sustainability. What about you?
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Same. I was actually looking into sustainable packaging. Maybe we could explore biodegradable materials.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: That sounds solid. We could even do a short survey to get student opinions on eco-friendly products.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01

segments.text: Great idea. Let's meet tomorrow after class to finalize the topic and divide the task.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_00

segments.text: Perfect. I'll book a study room in the library for three minutes.
segments.speaker: SPEAKER_01
